# Web Reader

# Description

Given a publicly accessible URL, the Web Reader activity extracts the text in a
                format suitable for feeding to an LLM, to offer context from the public domain.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Search engine - Select the search engine to use from the available dropdown list. Currently available: Jina.ai.
* URL - A publicly accessible URL. This field supports String type input.





* Web Reader - Automatically generated output variable.
* Text - The text from the URL. Automatically generated output variable.
